law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 121, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 653, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 605, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 131, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 331, sec. 57, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 113, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982.
